name: Lands of Dandelion
title: Jean: Lands of Dandelion
inPlayDescription: When your Jean, who has this card equipped, is on the field, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Dandelion Field will cause you to deal +1 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF"><span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Jean to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Jean, equip this card.After Jean equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Dandelion Breeze once.When your Jean, who has this card equipped, is on the field, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Dandelion Field will cause you to deal +1 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF"><span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo DMG.(You must have Jean in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
